articles.title: 10 lesser-known tips to help you study for long hours - The Times of India
articles.description: Cramming? This Web Story isn't about mindless hours! Learn 10 powerful tips to maximize focus, retention, and make long study sessions actually effective.
articles.content: Optimize your study space for comfort and focus. Ensure proper lighting, ventilation, and a clutter-free desk. Ambient noise can be helpful for some, so try background music without lyrics.
